title: Olaf the Bard

properties.name: description
properties.value: Olaf the Bard is a travelling bard and member of the Fremennik Council of Elders. His vote is required for the completion of The Fremennik Trials. The player is required to make a Lyre from the branch of a Swaying tree and string it using Golden fleece. The bard then tells the player to play in the Rellekka Longhall Bar. After doing so, he will pledge his vote and teach the player how to turn the lyre into an Enchanted lyre. He can be found wandering just east of the long hall.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Olaf the Bard
This article is about the bard in Rellekka. For the navigator in the northern Fremennik Province, see Olaf Hradson.

SMW Subobject for The Fremennik ExilesNPC location: RellekkaUses infobox: NPCNPC ID: 9274Examine: A Fremennik bard.Release date: 26 September 2019Image: File:Olaf the Bard.pngIs members only: trueIs variant of: Olaf the Bard

Olaf the Bard is a travelling bard and member of the Fremennik Council of Elders. His vote is required for the completion of The Fremennik Trials. The player is required to make a Lyre from the branch of a Swaying tree and string it using Golden fleece. The bard then tells the player to play in the Rellekka Longhall Bar. After doing so, he will pledge his vote and teach the player how to turn the lyre into an Enchanted lyre. He can be found wandering just east of the long hall.

Players who have unlocked all non-holiday music tracks can buy a Music cape from Olaf the Bard at the cost of 99,000 coins. In order to trim the music cape, players are required to unlock all music tracks, including holiday event tracks as well as completion of all achievement diaries.

When spoken to with a basilisk jaw in the player's inventory, he will tell a tale about the basilisks. After this, the player will be able to create Neitiznot faceguards.

Contents

  • 1 Stock
  • 2 Dialogue
  • 3 Changes
    • 3.1 Gallery (historical)
  • 4 Trivia

Stock[edit | edit source]

Note: If a player has unlocked all music tracks (including holiday tracks) and completed every achievement diary, they will receive the trimmed variant of the cape instead.

sold at

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
30 July 2015
(update)

Olaf now wears and sells the music cape.

Gallery (historical)[edit | edit source]

2 November 2004 –
30 July 2015 		30 July 2015 –
present

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • In the original version of The Fremennik Trials featured in the RuneScape 2 beta, he appeared as the character Olaf.
  • He has a brother named Falo the Bard.
  • Olaf is a name of Scandinavian origin, meaning 'ancestor'.
